sentences: Shandro Jahangier (born (1992-02-19)February 19, 1992), better known by his stage name Sandro Silva, is a Dutch DJ and record producer.
He is known for his broad, energetic sound combined with a musical depth acquired by his years of piano study.
Shandro Jahangier was born on February 19, 1992 in Zoetermeer, Netherlands.
Jahangier started his career in 2009 at the age of 17.
His release, Prom Night was featured as an Essential Choice on Pete Tongâ€™s BBC radio show.

He has released his own tracks on (Steve Aoki's) Dimmak Records, (Laidback Luke's) Mixmash Records, Musical Freedom, Newstate Records and his song with Bizzey, "Get Lower" was released in 2011 through Atlantic Records.
The song reached the top of the dance-charts worldwide, including the Netherlands, Jahangier's hometown, where it peaked at the top of the Dutch Top 40 and the Mega Single Top 100.
He has played in clubs and festivals including EDC Las Vegas, LIV Miami, Creamfields Liverpool, Ministry of Sound London, Privilege and Ushuaia Ibiza.
2015: "Someone Like U" (with Dirtcaps featuring Cathy Dennis)
2019: "Story of a Violin" (with Broz Rodriguez & Calixto)
2020: "Raver Dome" (with 3 Are Legend and Justin Prime)
2012: Sandro Silva and Oliver Twizt - "Gladiator" (Sandro Silva Remix)
2013: DJ Pauly D - "Back to Love" (featuring Jay Sean) (Sandro Silva Remix)
